LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: 「There's... no one here?」

LABEL: 0x2E4
STRING: A merciless reality greeted us as we were certain of the rescue team's arrival.

LABEL: 0x368
STRING: Yukari shouted.

LABEL: 0x37E
STRING: She sounded angry.

LABEL: 0x3A0
STRING: She soon lost her vigor, however.

LABEL: 0x452
STRING: 「The rescue ship definitely came here...」

LABEL: 0x486
STRING: 「This can't be happening...」

LABEL: 0x4B7
STRING: She was dismayed.

LABEL: 0x4D1
STRING: She looked like a doll who had lost its purpose.

LABEL: 0x57F
STRING: 「...Wait.」

LABEL: 0x5F6
STRING: 「What's that suit?」

LABEL: 0x63B
STRING: She let out a sharp voice and pointed at something.

LABEL: 0x673
STRING: 「What is that...?」

LABEL: 0x68F
STRING: I could see a familiar object lying there.

LABEL: 0x6BB
STRING: It was my partner, whom I had worn countless times.

LABEL: 0x6E3
STRING: We were the best of friends who had braved the sea floor together...

LABEL: 0x71F
STRING: In the corner of the emergency room, two sets of diving suits lay casually on the floor.

LABEL: 0x75B
STRING: There was also the deep aquarium lying on the floor as if abandoned.

LABEL: 0x7A9
STRING: The jellyfish I caught should still be trapped inside.

LABEL: 0x8A9
STRING: 「Jellyfish-chan, long time no see!」

LABEL: 0x935
STRING: 「It's me!」

LABEL: 0x95C
STRING: Tokiwa ran off and picked up the aquarium.

LABEL: 0x990
STRING: Even if she talked to it, it wouldn't answer. She did know that, right?

LABEL: 0xA29
STRING: Yukari watched her with a dubious expression.

LABEL: 0xA5B
STRING: ...Come to think of it, I hadn't told her about the Scalyfoot incident.

LABEL: 0xABD
STRING: 「Yukari-san, I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0xB4B
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0xB68
STRING: 「I failed to tell you earlier, but actually, it was me who brought that here.」

LABEL: 0xBCD
STRING: 「You did?」

LABEL: 0xBEB
STRING: 「Yeah, that deep aquarium and those diving suits over there, too.」

LABEL: 0xC52
STRING: 「No, I'm talking about what's behind them...」

LABEL: 0xCE3
STRING: 「I've never seen a suit like that.」

LABEL: 0xD54
STRING: I followed Yukari's gaze again.

LABEL: 0xD7E
STRING: At the back of the emergency room...

LABEL: 0xD98
STRING: Behind the familiar <SHEEP III> diving suits, even further back...

LABEL: 0xDD3
STRING: There was... what looked like a diving suit in an unfamiliar color.

LABEL: 0xE1E
STRING: 「That's...?」

LABEL: 0xE45
STRING: Hiragino sounded suspicious as well while crushing a xylitol tablet in his mouth.

LABEL: 0xE87
STRING: It was much slimmer than the diving suit I had worn twice, but it was definitely one.

LABEL: 0xEF7
STRING: If even Yukari didn't know about it, then it must not have been on the <SHEEP III> originally.

LABEL: 0xF62
STRING: In other words, it had been brought in from the outside.

LABEL: 0xF94
STRING: Which meant――

LABEL: 0x101E
STRING: 「I think it was worn for safety reasons.」

LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: 「Did... the rescue team come after all?」

LABEL: 0x10DF
STRING: 「But... if that's the case, where in the world are they?」

LABEL: 0x1112
STRING: A missing rescue team...

LABEL: 0x1130
STRING: However, since the diving suit had been brought in, it was clear that they were here.

LABEL: 0x117A
STRING: Why hadn't we run into them inside this confined submarine, then?

LABEL: 0x11BC
STRING: There was no reason to hide after searching for us.

LABEL: 0x11FE
STRING: Why had they not made themselves known?

LABEL: 0x1232
STRING: 「In any case.」

LABEL: 0x124C
STRING: 「Let's call the ship. If we can get in touch with the rescue team――」

LABEL: 0x12F8
STRING: 「Y-You're right. As long as we can get a handle on the rescue team's movements...」

LABEL: 0x1345
STRING: 「Wait a minute.」

LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: Hiragino stopped us from getting excited.

LABEL: 0x13B0
STRING: His calm voice brought my stray thoughts back in order.

LABEL: 0x14A8
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x14D5
STRING: 「Over there――」

LABEL: 0x14F1
STRING: 「The rescue ship is on the other side of the pressurization room, right?」

LABEL: 0x1546
STRING: 「...That's right!」

LABEL: 0x1566
STRING: 「The pressurization room also houses the rescue hatch.」

LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: 「According to the radar, the rescue ship's definitely connected there.」

LABEL: 0x15E7
STRING: In other words...

LABEL: 0x15FF
STRING: The emergency room was a rescue area in more ways than one.

LABEL: 0x16AF
STRING: 「If the rescue ship's still connected, there might be some clues left if we look inside.」

LABEL: 0x1715
STRING: 「I don't know where this so-called rescue team went, but...」

LABEL: 0x175E
STRING: 「I get what you're saying.」

LABEL: 0x1796
STRING: 「Now then, please check the rescue ship, Hiragino-sensei and Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x17E2
STRING: 「Katagiri-san and I will go search the other floors.」

LABEL: 0x182E
STRING: 「Let's go, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x1859
STRING: 「R-Right!」

LABEL: 0x191A
STRING: Yukari dashed out as soon as she finished talking.

LABEL: 0x1944
STRING: She pulled me along by my arm forcefully.

LABEL: 0x1972
STRING: Dragged diagonally downward, I somehow managed to rotate my legs in that unstable posture.

LABEL: 0x19CE
STRING: 「Y-Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x19F9
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x1A24
STRING: I almost bit my tongue because of the speed we were going.

LABEL: 0x1A5E
STRING: On the other hand, her tone was calm.

LABEL: 0x1A9C
STRING: What were her legs and hips made out of...?

LABEL: 0x1ACC
STRING: 「The rescue team is already here, right?」

LABEL: 0x1AF8
STRING: 「Don't you think it's fine to relax a bit?」

LABEL: 0x1B1E
STRING: 「Actually, please slow down a little...」

LABEL: 0x1BDC
STRING: 「The situation isn't that optimistic, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x1C3D
STRING: Her voice was as composed as ever.

LABEL: 0x1C69
STRING: However, I felt like there was a different kind of impatience seeping through.

LABEL: 0x1D0B
STRING: 「Please think about it.」

LABEL: 0x1D39
STRING: 「What do you think the rescue team who comes to the <SHEEP III> will do first?」

LABEL: 0x1DAD
STRING: Her question was sudden.

LABEL: 0x1DCB
STRING: Unable to gauge her true intentions, I hesitated.

LABEL: 0x1E6B
STRING: 「Then, let me rephrase.」

LABEL: 0x1E93
STRING: 「Do you remember what we did yesterday after the accident?」

LABEL: 0x1EFA
STRING: Me, Touri, Yukari, and Hiragino had gathered in the lobby on the second floor.

LABEL: 0x1F36
STRING: After that, we split into two groups――

LABEL: 0x1F66
STRING: 「...We searched for survivors.」

LABEL: 0x1F9B
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x2016
STRING: 「...That's what the rescue team should be doing too.」

LABEL: 0x2051
STRING: Yukari stopped walking as she hung her head.

LABEL: 0x20AB
STRING: 「Yukari-san...?」

LABEL: 0x20D8
STRING: 「It's strange...」

LABEL: 0x2159
STRING: 「Why haven't we seen them?」

LABEL: 0x2193
STRING: 「They're looking for us, as well.」

LABEL: 0x21C1
STRING: 「And... they must have brought in some equipment too.」

LABEL: 0x220B
STRING: 「They should have a loudspeaker with them.」

LABEL: 0x226A
STRING: Sure, what she said made sense, but...

LABEL: 0x22B1
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x232C
STRING: 「This silence is... strange.」

LABEL: 0x235F
STRING: No matter how hard we strained our ears, all we could hear was our own breathing.

LABEL: 0x23A7
STRING: If I hadn't seen the shadow on the radar or the abandoned diving suit in the emergency room,

LABEL: 0x23FB
STRING: I would have no idea that the rescue team was here at all.

LABEL: 0x2447
STRING: What the hell were they doing?

LABEL: 0x2473
STRING: What happened to them?

LABEL: 0x2515
STRING: 「...Let's hurry up and find them.」

LABEL: 0x253D
STRING: 「Since the diving suit was there, they must be somewhere around here.」

LABEL: 0x258B
STRING: 「Whatever their circumstances may be, nothing will happen until we meet up with them.」

LABEL: 0x25DE
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x25F4
STRING: Yukari was right. We needed to think about getting back alive first and foremost rather than worrying about what the unknown rescue team was doing.

LABEL: 0x2658
STRING: And to that end, we needed to find them as soon as possible.

LABEL: 0x270E
STRING: 「For now, let's search the third floor...」

LABEL: 0x2744
STRING: 「We've already been to the wheelhouse, theater room, and emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x279A
STRING: 「There aren't many places left here...」

LABEL: 0x27D9
STRING: Even if this was the largest cruise submarine in the world, having lost the rear section, the <SHEEP III> wasn't particularly spacious now.

LABEL: 0x2846
STRING: It probably wouldn't take long to search if we went from top to bottom, but...

LABEL: 0x2896
STRING: 「Yukari-san, how about going to Touri and Reiri first?」

LABEL: 0x28DA
STRING: 「We should tell them about what's going on.」

LABEL: 0x2996
STRING: 「Right... Touri-san should be able to help us with the search as well.」

LABEL: 0x29ED
STRING: 「Besides...」

LABEL: 0x2A09
STRING: 「Maybe they've already met with the rescue team.」

LABEL: 0x2A5A
STRING: 「That's possible. Then, let's head downstairs.」

LABEL: 0x2AAF
STRING: Yukari headed for the stairs, almost running.

LABEL: 0x2AE5
STRING: I chased after her back all the way to the second floor.

LABEL: 0x2BD3
STRING: We ran down the stairs and immediately ran to the room where Touri and Reiri had been.

LABEL: 0x2C1D
STRING: The crew rooms were lined up in the hallway.

LABEL: 0x2C3F
STRING: There was no doubt as to which of those rooms was our target.

LABEL: 0x2C87
STRING: 「The door...」

LABEL: 0x2CA1
STRING: Only one room's door was open.

LABEL: 0x2CE1
STRING: That was the room they had been in, if I remembered correctly.

LABEL: 0x2D7C
STRING: ――Why was the door open?

LABEL: 0x2DA4
STRING: I wondered if there had been some kind of commotion.

LABEL: 0x2DCE
STRING: The hallway was silent.

LABEL: 0x2DE8
STRING: Light leaked through the door.

LABEL: 0x2E02
STRING: The two girls.

LABEL: 0x2E1C
STRING: A scene of them talking to each other flashed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x2E50
STRING: I didn't know if you could call them close, but there was always a constant conversation between them.

LABEL: 0x2EAC
STRING: I couldn't hear any of it now.

LABEL: 0x2ED2
STRING: ...I had a bad feeling about this.

LABEL: 0x2FF2
STRING: Yukari dashed off.

LABEL: 0x300C
STRING: 「Wait, Yukari!」

LABEL: 0x3028
STRING: I shouted as I followed after her.

LABEL: 0x304C
STRING: If someone had hurt Touri or Reiri...

LABEL: 0x3088
STRING: If the culprit was still inside the room...

LABEL: 0x30BA
STRING: Yukari was in danger.

LABEL: 0x30E7
STRING: 「Touri-san! Reiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x3114
STRING: I desperately reached out my arm, but...

LABEL: 0x3136
STRING: Yukari rushed into the crew room.

LABEL: 0x3162
STRING: 「Shit――」

LABEL: 0x317E
STRING: I entered the room one step behind her.

LABEL: 0x31FF
STRING: Her small back was frozen in place.

LABEL: 0x3225
STRING: The room was silent.

LABEL: 0x3249
STRING: ――No one's here?

LABEL: 0x3267
STRING: I peered over her back.

LABEL: 0x3289
STRING: On the cold floor...

LABEL: 0x32A1
STRING: ...Touri and Reiri were lying there.

LABEL: 0x32D2
STRING: 「Touri-san! Reiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x32FF
STRING: Yukari picked up Touri's upper body.

LABEL: 0x3329
STRING: I gently sat up Reiri, who was lying face down.

LABEL: 0x3367
STRING: What was this...?

LABEL: 0x3387
STRING: Her breathing was calm.

LABEL: 0x33AB
STRING: What was going on...?

LABEL: 0x33CB
STRING: There were no visible injuries, either.

LABEL: 0x33ED
STRING: It was just like when she was first discovered.

LABEL: 0x342B
STRING: She was just unconscious, sleeping...

LABEL: 0x3459
STRING: We laid them both down on the bed beside me.

LABEL: 0x348B
STRING: When I turned around, I saw that Yukari had a grim expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x34B3
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x355F
STRING: 「I... What――」

LABEL: 0x357F
STRING: 「Is there some sort of a big misunderstanding here...?」

LABEL: 0x35BA
STRING: She sank deep into thought.

LABEL: 0x3604
STRING: The fallen girls.

LABEL: 0x3622
STRING: The open door to their room.

LABEL: 0x3644
STRING: An unseen rescue team.

LABEL: 0x3666
STRING: ...It was like our excitement back at the wheelhouse earlier had been a lie.

LABEL: 0x369C
STRING: Hadn't the rescue team come to save us?

LABEL: 0x36DC
STRING: I felt like things had gone from bad to worse ever since they arrived.

LABEL: 0x3734
STRING: Under normal circumstances, we should have boarded the rescue ship and headed for the surface by now.

LABEL: 0x378E
STRING: How did it come to this...?

LABEL: 0x3821
STRING: 「Yukari-san, tell me something.」

LABEL: 0x3845
STRING: 「Why did Touri and Reiri have to go through this?」

LABEL: 0x3893
STRING: 「Why didn't the rescue team show themselves to us?」

LABEL: 0x38E9
STRING: 「If you have any idea why, please tell me.」

LABEL: 0x3925
STRING: She only shook her head from side to side.

LABEL: 0x39B9
STRING: 「I don't know...」

LABEL: 0x39FD
STRING: 「Don't know... anything.」

LABEL: 0x3A2C
STRING: Yukari raised her head as she answered.

LABEL: 0x3AC2
STRING: 「Anyway, let's find the rescue team as quickly as possible.」

LABEL: 0x3AFC
STRING: 「That's the only thing we can do.」

LABEL: 0x3B39
STRING: 「What about these two?」

LABEL: 0x3B5F
STRING: 「Shouldn't we contact Hiragino-san?」

LABEL: 0x3BF6
STRING: Her face clouded over at my suggestion.

LABEL: 0x3C24
STRING: Eventually, she spoke with some difficulty.

LABEL: 0x3CC0
STRING: 「...To be honest, we don't have time for that.」

LABEL: 0x3CFF
STRING: Even as she spoke, her eyes were looking at the clock on the wall.

LABEL: 0x3D44
STRING: 「As far as I can tell, they're just sleeping...」

LABEL: 0x3D7E
STRING: 「Let's continue our search.」

LABEL: 0x3E32
STRING: Following Yukari's lead, I left the sleeping sisters and exited the crew room.

LABEL: 0x3E88
STRING: Just to be sure, we locked the room from the outside.

LABEL: 0x3EB8
STRING: 「But, if someone put them to sleep...」

LABEL: 0x3F6E
STRING: 「Locked this way, it'll serve as a warning to anyone who did it.」

LABEL: 0x3FB4
STRING: 「They wouldn't think to mess with the girls anymore in a closed space like the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x403A
STRING: We resumed our search and returned to inspecting the rooms.

LABEL: 0x406A
STRING: Yukari used her master key to unlock the doors of the rooms on the second floor, and we checked inside each of them.

LABEL: 0x40B0
STRING: Aside from the room where Touri and Reiri were, there was no sign of anyone entering the other rooms.

LABEL: 0x40FE
STRING: However, since we could only identify abnormalities based on the luggage and furniture that were originally placed inside the rooms,

LABEL: 0x4166
STRING: we couldn't deny the possibility that someone had been inside...

LABEL: 0x4214
STRING: 「There's no one here.」

LABEL: 0x4239
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x424F
STRING: There was no one.

LABEL: 0x426B
STRING: Now that we'd investigated the third and second floors, the possibilities were decreasing.

LABEL: 0x42C9
STRING: We automatically made our way to the stairs.

LABEL: 0x4365
STRING: 「Be careful...」

LABEL: 0x4390
STRING: Yukari grumbled just as I put my foot on the spiral staircase.

LABEL: 0x43CA
STRING: Was that directed at me? Or was she talking to herself?

LABEL: 0x442B
STRING: 「What the hell happened――」

LABEL: 0x4458
STRING: Just then...

LABEL: 0x44A9
STRING: 「Whoah!」

LABEL: 0x44D2
STRING: 「Eek!」

LABEL: 0x454E
STRING: A siren rang out without warning.

LABEL: 0x457A
STRING: I instinctively crouched down and looked up at the ceiling.

LABEL: 0x4610
STRING: 「This sound...」

LABEL: 0x4633
STRING: It was a familiar warning sound.

LABEL: 0x4657
STRING: I recalled that water-filled scene――

LABEL: 0x4681
STRING: 「This is the fire alarm...」

LABEL: 0x46AB
STRING: I noticed that I could hear the sound of water striking the floor of the <SHEEP III> violently from downstairs.

LABEL: 0x46FC
STRING: It was like a downpour hitting asphalt.

LABEL: 0x4730
STRING: There was no mistaking it.

LABEL: 0x474A
STRING: The sprinklers had been activated...

LABEL: 0x4778
STRING: 「Downstairs, hurry!」

LABEL: 0x4808
STRING: 「Wait!」

LABEL: 0x482F
STRING: 「Why?!」

LABEL: 0x4873
STRING: Did she think the sprinkler system would malfunction on its own?

LABEL: 0x48C5
STRING: It was certain that a fire had broken out downstairs or something similar.

LABEL: 0x496E
STRING: Something had happened...

LABEL: 0x4AA5
STRING: Tokiwa and Hiragino were in the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x4BE8
STRING: Touri and Reiri were asleep.

LABEL: 0x4CE6
STRING: And Yukari and I were here.

LABEL: 0x4D10
STRING: At a time like this, something had happened on the first floor.

LABEL: 0x4D44
STRING: There must be someone down there.

LABEL: 0x4D70
STRING: It wasn't necessarily the rescue team, but...

LABEL: 0x4D9C
STRING: 「Let's go! What are we going to do if we don't go now?!」

LABEL: 0x4E3C
STRING: 「But, something's――」

LABEL: 0x4E65
STRING: 「If we don't hurry, they'll get away!」

LABEL: 0x4EAB
STRING: I shook off Yukari's arm as she tried to stop me.

LABEL: 0x4ED3
STRING: It wasn't that I couldn't understand why she was being so cautious, but now wasn't the time for that.

LABEL: 0x4F1F
STRING: We had to go.

LABEL: 0x4F37
STRING: Leaving Yukari behind, I hurried down the stairs――

LABEL: 0x4F6D
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x5010
STRING: 「Agh!」

LABEL: 0x5028
STRING: My vision turned white.

LABEL: 0x504C
STRING: Was this... smoke?

LABEL: 0x506A
STRING: White smoke was floating up from the first floor.

LABEL: 0x5094
STRING: Agitated as I was, I had taken it head on.

LABEL: 0x50CE
STRING: 「Uugh...」

LABEL: 0x50E8
STRING: My vision blurred.

LABEL: 0x5104
STRING: This... wasn't a dummy like yesterday. Was it real?

LABEL: 0x5146
STRING: I collapsed.

LABEL: 0x5162
STRING: The floor was right in front of my face.

LABEL: 0x518F
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x51B0
STRING: I could hear Yukari calling out to me in the distance.

LABEL: 0x51DA
STRING: I see. So she saw the smoke and tried to stop me...

LABEL: 0x5218
STRING: By the time I noticed, it was too late.

LABEL: 0x523E
STRING: My limbs were heavy, and I couldn't move.

LABEL: 0x5262
STRING: And then...

LABEL: 0x5282
STRING: My consciousness...

LABEL: 0x529A
STRING: Faded away...

LABEL: 0x536D
STRING: 「...giri-san!」

LABEL: 0x5389
STRING: A distant voice echoed in my dream.

LABEL: 0x53AD
STRING: It sounded familiar――

LABEL: 0x54B8
STRING: 「Please wake up, Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x54E9
STRING: 「...Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x5507
STRING: 「What did I...?」

LABEL: 0x5541
STRING: I got up as I said that.

LABEL: 0x5567
STRING: I used my arms―unable to put much strength into them―to support my weight.

LABEL: 0x559B
STRING: Was I... unconscious?

LABEL: 0x55C9
STRING: I spun my heavy head and looked around.

LABEL: 0x55FB
STRING: Why was I in a crew room...?

LABEL: 0x5631
STRING: I soon noticed that I could hear the sound of heavy rain from outside.

LABEL: 0x5663
STRING: Rain...?

LABEL: 0x5679
STRING: In the deep sea?

LABEL: 0x5697
STRING: There was no way it would rain inside the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x56CA
STRING: It was the sprinklers...

LABEL: 0x58F3
STRING: 「...Do you remember now?」

LABEL: 0x5920
STRING: I nodded my head a few times at Yukari's words.

LABEL: 0x594E
STRING: Right.

LABEL: 0x5964
STRING: We were searching for the missing rescue team when we heard the sprinklers activate on the first floor...

LABEL: 0x59C2
STRING: 「Right... Yukari-san, what about the fire!?」

LABEL: 0x59F0
STRING: 「How long has it been since then?」

LABEL: 0x5A20
STRING: 「What happened to the fire!?」

LABEL: 0x5AB8
STRING: 「Please calm down, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x5AEB
STRING: She was surprisingly calm as she said that.

LABEL: 0x5B30
STRING: 「I haven't checked yet, but...」

LABEL: 0x5B62
STRING: 「There's probably no fire.」

LABEL: 0x5BAF
STRING: There was no fire?

LABEL: 0x5BD1
STRING: Then, the sprinklers that were still on...

LABEL: 0x5C75
STRING: 「More importantly, how are you feeling?」

LABEL: 0x5CA5
STRING: 「Anything out of the ordinary?」

LABEL: 0x5CCE
STRING: 「Huh? Well...」

LABEL: 0x5CEC
STRING: 「Now that you mention it, my head hurts...?」

LABEL: 0x5D18
STRING: There was a stinging pain.

LABEL: 0x5D40
STRING: When I stroked the back of my aching head, I felt a strange bulge... A bump?

LABEL: 0x5DEA
STRING: 「Ah, well, you see...」

LABEL: 0x5E17
STRING: Yukari blushed.

LABEL: 0x5E35
STRING: Her eyes darted around ominously.

LABEL: 0x5EC9
STRING: 「Um, when I was carrying you, well...」

LABEL: 0x5F07
STRING: 「I accidentally hit the door...」

LABEL: 0x5F44
STRING: 「You carried me?」

LABEL: 0x5FD4
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x5FEF
STRING: 「By yourself, right...?」

LABEL: 0x6024
STRING: 「Of course. There's no one else here.」

LABEL: 0x605F
STRING: Wait a minute.

LABEL: 0x607B
STRING: She said it so nonchalantly that I almost let it slide, but what exactly was she talking about?

LABEL: 0x60D7
STRING: I was an adult man.

LABEL: 0x60FF
STRING: I also worked out a little.

LABEL: 0x6123
STRING: So, I weighed quite a bit.

LABEL: 0x6147
STRING: 「You're joking...」

LABEL: 0x61D3
STRING: 「I exercise a little, too, you know.」

LABEL: 0x6214
STRING: She puffed out her chest with pride.

LABEL: 0x6240
STRING: ...She looked like a middle schooler doing that, but...

LABEL: 0x627E
STRING: I hadn't expected her to have this kind of strength hidden within her.

LABEL: 0x62AE
STRING: Alright, let's make extra sure not to pick a fight with her from now on.

LABEL: 0x62E2
STRING: Also, this wasn't the time to talk about this.

LABEL: 0x630A
STRING: As we talked, time continued to flow.

LABEL: 0x6342
STRING: Having regained my composure, I asked her again.

LABEL: 0x637C
STRING: 「Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x6394
STRING: 「In the end, what happened?」

LABEL: 0x6432
STRING: 「...Right.」

LABEL: 0x644C
STRING: 「That smoke from before...」

LABEL: 0x6476
STRING: 「It might be soporific.」

LABEL: 0x64A9
STRING: Soporific...?

LABEL: 0x64C3
STRING: I was thrown off for a moment by the unexpected word.

LABEL: 0x64F1
STRING: It... didn't seem like she was joking.

LABEL: 0x6525
STRING: Yukari's expression remained serious.

LABEL: 0x65B9
STRING: 「Thanks to your complete carelessness, you ended up inhaling soporific smoke and collapsed.」

LABEL: 0x660F
STRING: 「I held my breath while carrying your unconscious body,」

LABEL: 0x6649
STRING: 「and slipped into a nearby crew room.」

LABEL: 0x6680
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x66A0
STRING: Hearing it again made me realize just how worthless I was.

LABEL: 0x66DE
STRING: Actually, I couldn't even hold a candle to Yukari.

LABEL: 0x670E
STRING: Despite our predicament, she overcame it on her own?

LABEL: 0x6760
STRING: She might be small, but she wasn't the chief attendant for nothing.

LABEL: 0x6808
STRING: 「Well, that said...」

LABEL: 0x682A
STRING: 「Now that we're in this room, there's no need to worry.」

LABEL: 0x6874
STRING: 「Water resistance was a big priority, and a lot of resources went into it when designing the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x6932
STRING: 「Even that soporific smoke shouldn't be able to leak in here.」

LABEL: 0x6995
STRING: She smiled.

LABEL: 0x69B5
STRING: Was this a technique to reassure anxious passengers...? It was more likely just her own personal charm.

LABEL: 0x6A15
STRING: She was normally strict with herself and others, and valued discipline.

LABEL: 0x6A4D
STRING: This relaxed look and reassuring smile she rarely showed were, to put it cheaply, "soothing."

LABEL: 0x6ABD
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x6AD5
STRING: Even if Yukari was right and the immediate crisis had passed, our situation remained as urgent as ever.

LABEL: 0x6B2B
STRING: There were many things I didn't understand and was curious about, but there were other things I had to ask first.

LABEL: 0x6B7F
STRING: 「Who would use soporific smoke――」

LABEL: 0x6C17
STRING: 「I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x6C3A
STRING: 「It couldn't be...」

LABEL: 0x6C56
STRING: 「Did the rescue team――」

LABEL: 0x6CEC
STRING: 「That's not possible.」

LABEL: 0x6D29
STRING: Yukari interrupted me immediately.

LABEL: 0x6D59
STRING: I could tell from the urgency she had done so that she was more impatient than sure.

LABEL: 0x6D99
STRING: She wanted to deny it at all costs.

LABEL: 0x6DBF
STRING: It wasn't possible.

LABEL: 0x6DD9
STRING: It must not be true.

LABEL: 0x6DF9
STRING: I couldn't help but feel her intent.

LABEL: 0x6E95
STRING: 「...That's... impossible.」

LABEL: 0x6F1E
STRING: 「It must be the same person who attacked Reiri-san yesterday.」

LABEL: 0x6F67
STRING: Yukari made her declaration, but her lips twisted bitterly.

LABEL: 0x6F9D
STRING: ...I guess it wasn't in her nature to lie.

LABEL: 0x6FCB
STRING: There was no way she wasn't aware of the weak basis of her statement.

LABEL: 0x700B
STRING: 「Reiri said that it was one of us...」

LABEL: 0x704F
STRING: 「But none of us could have spread that soporific smoke all over the ship.」

LABEL: 0x7113
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, do you actually believe what she said?」

LABEL: 0x7159
STRING: 「That was nothing but a makeshift lie.」

LABEL: 0x71DC
STRING: Reiri's sarcastic smile came back to me.

LABEL: 0x7208
STRING: For sure, what she said didn't make sense all the time.

LABEL: 0x724A
STRING: And she wasn't trustworthy in the same way Tokiwa was.

LABEL: 0x728C
STRING: However, there was something unfathomable about her that was different from Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x72E4
STRING: Would she lie for the sake of self-preservation?

LABEL: 0x73A3
STRING: 「No matter how much we searched, we never saw anyone else.」

LABEL: 0x73EB
STRING: 「Isn't this... the work of the rescue team, after all?」

LABEL: 0x7423
STRING: 「And maybe they also put Touri and Reiri to sleep――」

LABEL: 0x74C3
STRING: 「Even if――」

LABEL: 0x753C
STRING: 「...Even in the unlikely event that they did, there had to have been a reason.」

LABEL: 0x758C
STRING: 「The rescue team wouldn't do something like this for no reason at all...」

LABEL: 0x75D5
STRING: 「Then what is the reason?!」

LABEL: 0x7671
STRING: 「...I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x7698
STRING: 「Didn't you say you wouldn't hide things from us anymore?」

LABEL: 0x775F
STRING: Yukari raised her voice.

LABEL: 0x7797
STRING: It was so abrupt that she seemed more surprised than me.

LABEL: 0x77DF
STRING: She, who had been speaking calmly and quietly until now,

LABEL: 0x7835
STRING: raised her voice as if screaming and let out her thoughts like a dam bursting.

LABEL: 0x78D3
STRING: 「I... want to know that too.」

LABEL: 0x78FF
STRING: 「Despite this situation, I'm still the chief attendant.」

LABEL: 0x7945
STRING: 「Now that no one else is left, everything related to the <SHEEP III> is under my responsibility.」

LABEL: 0x7A09
STRING: 「I'm not saying anything based solely on my position.」

LABEL: 0x7A4B
STRING: 「No one knows more about this ship or this sea than I do.」

LABEL: 0x7A9B
STRING: 「I understand the <SHEEP III> better than anyone.」

LABEL: 0x7B33
STRING: 「And yet...」

LABEL: 0x7B53
STRING: 「Why don't I know anything?」

LABEL: 0x7B88
STRING: Yukari's face contorted in frustration.

LABEL: 0x7C24
STRING: 「...If I hadn't been careful, not only you, but I too would've fallen asleep.」

LABEL: 0x7C7A
STRING: 「Whatever the circumstances, the person who sprayed that soporific smoke made no distinction between us.」

LABEL: 0x7D70
STRING: Indeed, if Yukari had been walking in the lead back then, she would have been the first to inhale the smoke.

LABEL: 0x7DD6
STRING: She was supposed to be a co-worker and a colleague to the rescue team, so why...?

LABEL: 0x7E22
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x7E3A
STRING: Yukari's co-workers, the rescue team she thought was our salvation, not only didn't show themselves to us,

LABEL: 0x7E86
STRING: but also shunned Yukari herself.

LABEL: 0x7F0B
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x7F93
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x7FB0
STRING: 「Ah, well...」

LABEL: 0x7FCE
STRING: 「...Speaking of which, I wonder what happened to everyone else.」

LABEL: 0x801B
STRING: 「Everyone else...?」

LABEL: 0x8044
STRING: 「Touri and Reiri should still be sleeping in their room.」

LABEL: 0x807A
STRING: 「And Hiragino and Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x810E
STRING: 「Surely, it doesn't take much time to search the inside of the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0x8168
STRING: 「But I have no idea where they would go after they finish searching.」

LABEL: 0x81B1
STRING: 「In that case, there's a possibility that the two of them are wandering around without knowing about the smoke...」

LABEL: 0x8211
STRING: 「We have to meet up with them!」

LABEL: 0x82A1
STRING: 「Please wait.」

LABEL: 0x82C4
STRING: She stopped me as I was hurrying to the door.

LABEL: 0x830D
STRING: 「If you go outside now, you'll just inhale more smoke and collapse.」

LABEL: 0x8357
STRING: 「Fortunately, the smoke was detected, and the sprinklers on this floor seem to be working as well.」

LABEL: 0x83B4
STRING: If I listened closely, I could hear the sound of the sprinklers coming from the hallway through the door.

LABEL: 0x83FE
STRING: Water had been raining down for a while now.

LABEL: 0x8498
STRING: 「Most likely, it will wash away most of the smoke.」

LABEL: 0x84DE
STRING: 「We'll leave this room after things have settled down a bit.」

LABEL: 0x8579
STRING: 「Is that okay?」

LABEL: 0x859C
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x85B6
STRING: ...It was irritating.

LABEL: 0x85D2
STRING: While we were stuck here, I wondered if the people who smoked us were making their next move.

LABEL: 0x8628
STRING: It was hard to imagine that their goal was to just put us to sleep.

LABEL: 0x8670
STRING: Just as Yukari said, they must have some kind of goal in mind and were trying to put us to sleep without showing themselves.

LABEL: 0x86D0
STRING: 「...Come to think of it.」

LABEL: 0x86F0
STRING: 「How long was I asleep?」

LABEL: 0x8737
STRING: 「Just about ten minutes.」

LABEL: 0x875B
STRING: 「It's fortunate you didn't take a deeper breath.」

LABEL: 0x8795
STRING: 「You must've woken up so quickly because you didn't inhale a lot of smoke.」

LABEL: 0x8842
STRING: 「You're lucky.」

LABEL: 0x886B
STRING: Ten minutes, was it?

LABEL: 0x8883
STRING: With that much time,

LABEL: 0x88A9
STRING: the soporific smoke sprayed on the first floor should have reached the upper floor...

LABEL: 0x88E9
STRING: Upper floor, emergency room...

LABEL: 0x8909
STRING: ――I was still worried.

LABEL: 0x8986
STRING: 「Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x899E
STRING: 「I think I'll go and take a look outside for a second.」

LABEL: 0x8A42
STRING: 「You're still saying that?」

LABEL: 0x8A6B
STRING: 「Just for a little while.」

LABEL: 0x8A8B
STRING: 「If I hold my breath, I shouldn't lose consciousness――」

LABEL: 0x8B3D
STRING: 「...Be quiet, please.」

LABEL: 0x8B6A
STRING: 「Well, how about I just open the door and take a peek outside――」

LABEL: 0x8C1A
STRING: 「...I said be quiet!」

LABEL: 0x8C51
STRING: 「Why?!」

LABEL: 0x8C87
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x8C9F
STRING: Yukari stepped toward me and put her hand over my mouth.

LABEL: 0x8CF3
STRING: She stood on her toes while covering my mouth with her hand.

LABEL: 0x8D25
STRING: I could feel her weight clinging to my chest.

LABEL: 0x8D5B
STRING: Her hand on my mouth was soft, and there was a sweet scent...

LABEL: 0x8D99
STRING: ...Not now!

LABEL: 0x8DB7
STRING: What the hell was she doing...?

LABEL: 0x8E12
STRING: 「...Can't you hear that?」

LABEL: 0x8E3D
STRING: I strained my ears at her whisper.

LABEL: 0x8E69
STRING: The sound of the sprinklers hitting the floor.

LABEL: 0x8E93
STRING: They were still on.

LABEL: 0x8EB7
STRING: And other than that...

LABEL: 0x8ED5
STRING: I noticed another, different kind of wet sound.

LABEL: 0x8F31
STRING: Splock, splock, splock. The sound continued rhythmically.

LABEL: 0x8F83
STRING: It was like the sound of footsteps on a rainy highway...

LABEL: 0x8FC1
STRING: 「There's... someone in the hallway?」

LABEL: 0x8FEB
STRING: Yukari nodded silently.

LABEL: 0x9009
STRING: The soporific smoke was still out there.

LABEL: 0x902B
STRING: The sprinklers kept spraying their water.

LABEL: 0x9051
STRING: In the midst of it all, there was a sound of slow footsteps walking without a hint of panic.

LABEL: 0x908D
STRING: That was――

LABEL: 0x90A5
STRING: 「The one who sprayed the smoke...?」

LABEL: 0x913B
STRING: 「It's highly likely.」

LABEL: 0x91BE
STRING: 「But, what the hell are they doing...?」

LABEL: 0x91F5
STRING: The footsteps sounded distant now.

LABEL: 0x921D
STRING: If I strained my ears, I could hear the footsteps stopping every now and then.

LABEL: 0x9259
STRING: 「Looks like they're standing still in front of each room.」

LABEL: 0x9297
STRING: 「Like they're looking for something...」

LABEL: 0x92CB
STRING: Something, or... someone.

LABEL: 0x92F1
STRING: As of the encounter ten minutes ago, they probably knew of our presence.

LABEL: 0x9339
STRING: And it wasn't hard to imagine due to the fact that I had inhaled the smoke and collapsed.

LABEL: 0x938D
STRING: And yet, we were lucky enough to escape.

LABEL: 0x9421
STRING: I tightened my arm around Yukari suddenly.

LABEL: 0x9459
STRING: As if to pull her slender body closer.

LABEL: 0x9487
STRING: She resisted a bit at first but continued to cover my mouth while standing on her toes.

LABEL: 0x94E7
STRING: I held her firmly and sharpened my ears to hear what was happening outside.

LABEL: 0x9527
STRING: The footsteps slowly came closer.

LABEL: 0x9551
STRING: ...They might be looking for us.

LABEL: 0x958D
STRING: We knew about the smoke and had run away from them.

LABEL: 0x95C9
STRING: Moreover, Yukari, the chief attendant, had named herself to them in the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x9607
STRING: I wondered what they intended to do when they found us.

LABEL: 0x964D
STRING: ...Silence us?

LABEL: 0x9667
STRING: Or maybe... they were going to rescue us.

LABEL: 0x96A7
STRING: I didn't know...

LABEL: 0x96C3
STRING: I couldn't decide.

LABEL: 0x96E8
STRING: The footsteps were finally approaching our room.

LABEL: 0x970A
STRING: I could feel Yukari's heartbeat quicken.

LABEL: 0x9734
STRING: Who...

LABEL: 0x974A
STRING: Who the hell were they?

LABEL: 0x976F
STRING: I didn't even know if they were a friend or foe.

LABEL: 0x9795
STRING: And then,

LABEL: 0x97AB
STRING: finally,

LABEL: 0x97C7
STRING: the footsteps reached the front of our room――

LABEL: 0x97FB
STRING: ――And stopped.
